## Folder class

An item used to organize the items in a Repository.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Folder extends OrganizationalItem
```

**Extends:** [OrganizationalItem](./models.organizationalitem.md)

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                                       | Modifiers | Description                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)({ backendModel, linkedSchema, ...orgItemArgs })](./models.folder._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Folder</code> class |

## Properties

| Property                                                              | Modifiers | Type                                                  | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [\_backendModel](./models.folder._backendmodel.md)                    |           | [BackendFolder](./open-api-client.folder.md)          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [getInternalModel](./models.folder.getinternalmodel.md)               |           | () =&gt; [BackendFolder](./open-api-client.folder.md) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [isActive](./models.folder.isactive.md)                               |           | boolean                                               | Active state of the Folder. If the active state is set to false, the Folder and the items inside it cannot be published.                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [isActiveResolvedValue](./models.folder.isactiveresolvedvalue.md)     |           | boolean                                               | Value indicating whether this Folder and its items can be published. Returns true if the active state of this Folder and all of its ancestors is true. Returns false if the active state of this Folder or any of its ancestors is false. The individual active state of each Folder is represented by the property "IsActive". |
| [isLinkedSchemaMandatory](./models.folder.islinkedschemamandatory.md) |           | boolean                                               | Whether the linked Schema is mandatory.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [linkedSchema](./models.folder.linkedschema.md)                       |           | [Link](./models.link.md) \| undefined                 | <p>Linked Schema of the Folder.</p><p>The linked Schema acts as default Schema for Components created in the Folder. It can also acts as mandatory Schema, if "IsLinkedSchemaMandatory" is set to true. In the latter case, Components cannot be saved in the Folder unless they are based on this Schema.</p>                  |
